techmeme.title: Google adds support for 110 new languages in Translate, up from 133 languages before this update, its largest expansion ever, aided by the company's PaLM 2 LLM (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Naver-owned online comics platform Webtoon raised $315M in its Nasdaq IPO at $21 per share, the top of its $18-$21 marketed range, valuing the company at $2.7B (Song Jung-a/Financial Times)
An interview with Netflix's VP of external games Leanne Loombe on its push into gaming, focusing on narrative games without ads or in-app purchases, and more (Gene Park/Washington Post)
Telegram, used by half of Russia's 140M residents, has become a refuge for LGBTQ+ citizens, who routinely create new channels to avoid government surveillance (Sassafras Lowrey/Wired)
Testing ChatGPT, Vacay, and Mindtrip to plan a Norway trip shows none were perfect, but the AI chatbots streamlined travel decisions complementing one another (Ceylan Yeğinsu/New York Times)
